title: Integers represented by binary recursive sequences
abstract:
This paper is the continuation of \cite{htl}, where we deal with Lucas
sequences. Here we study integers represented by integer sequences which
satisfy binary recursive relations. In case of non-degenerate sequences we give
bounds for the highest index for which a term can be 0 and bounds on the growth
order of the absolute values of the terms, both only in terms of the two
initial values, which is a novel feature. Some of these bounds are best
possible apart from a multiplicative constant.
